tool_description: Aggregates revenue data from multiple sources and revenue types for royalty calculation.

catalog_number.description: Unique catalog identifier for the song

mechanical_revenue.description: Total mechanical revenue for the period

performance_revenue.description: Total performance revenue for the period

sync_revenue.description: Total synchronization revenue for the period

digital_revenue.description: Total digital platform revenue for the period

error_messages: Invalid revenue period: End date must be after start date and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Negative revenue values: All revenue amounts must be zero or positive numbers.
Missing catalog number: Valid catalog number is required for revenue aggregation.
Zero total revenue: At least one revenue type must have a value greater than zero.
usage: Provide catalog_number and revenue period dates. Include revenue amounts for different types (mechanical, performance, sync, digital). Returns aggregated revenue summary.

total_revenue.description: Sum of all revenue types for the period

revenue_breakdown.description: Array of revenue type descriptions with amounts
